= Components =
(generated)


*Component items*:
  * *Face - corrugator supercilii muscle (face-corrugator-supercilii-muscle)*: wrinkles forehead
  * *Face - depressor supercilii muscle (face-depressor-supercilii-muscle)*: depression of eyebrow
  * *Face - levator labii superioris muscle (face-levator-labii-superioris-muscle)*: dilates the nostril; elevates the upper lip and wing of the nose
  * *Face - frontalis muscle (face-frontalis-muscle)*: raises the eyebrows
  * *Face - occipitalis muscle (face-occipitalis-muscle)*: moves the scalp back
  * *Face - platysma muscle (face-platysma-muscle)*: draws the corners of the mouth inferiorly and widens it (as in expressions of sadness and fright). Also draws the skin of the neck superiorly when teeth are clenched
  * *Face - face skin (face-skin)*: sensory fibers from the skin
  * *Face - parotid skin (face-parotid-skin)*: facial skin over the parotid gland
  * *Face - zygomaticus major muscle, buccal (zygomaticus-major-muscle-buccal)*: draws angle of mouth upward and laterally
  * *Face - zygomaticus major muscle, proper (zygomaticus-major-muscle-proper)*: draws angle of mouth upward and laterally
  * *Face - zygomaticus minor muscle (zygomaticus-minor-muscle)*: elevates upper lip
  * *Face - procerus muscle (face-procerus)*: dilates the nostril; elevates the upper lip and wing of the nose
  * *Face - levator anguli oris muscle (levator-anguli-oris-muscle)*: smile (elevates angle of mouth)
  * *Face - depressor anguli oris muscle (depressor-anguli-oris-muscle)*: depresses angle of mouth
  * *Face - transverse muscle of the chin (transverse-chin-muscle)*: assist with pulling the lower lip downward and help to tighten the skin over the chin
  * *Face - depressor labii inferioris muscle (depressor-labii-inferioris-muscle)*: depress the lower lip
  * *Face - mentalis muscle (mentalis-muscle)*: elevates and wrinkles skin of chin, protrudes lower lip
  * *Face - buccinator muscle (buccinator-muscle)*: compress the cheeks against the teeth (blowing), mastication
  * *Face - orbicularis oris muscle (orbicularis-oris-muscle)*: pucker the lips
  * *Face - risorius muscle (risorius-muscle)*: assist with pulling the lower lip downward and help to tighten the skin over the chin
